segments.text: I notice the woman so absorbed in her task, it's almost peaceful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the overflowing sink breaks my heart, water everywhere she doesn't see.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle, unaware of the damage spreading.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are risking so much just for cookies, it tugs at me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's on that unstable stool, one wrong move and he'll tumble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's waiting so eagerly, innocent in her mischief.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The cookie jar full, but this feels like trouble brewing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside, the garden is serene, highlighting the sadness inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes waiting to be done, routine turned risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think about how a simple oversight could lead to tears.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The curtains tied back, letting in light on this potential sorrow.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a shame no one's paying attention to the real issues here.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The floor wet, cabinets soaked, all going unnoticed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel a pang watching this unfold so quietly.
segments.speaker: PAR
